name: The Toy Factory Across the Street
name_original: The Toy Factory Across the Street
description:
Francesca, a brilliant young transgender journalist, goes back to the house where she grew up to celebrate the birthday of her father. Unfortunately for Francesca, there's an abandoned toy factory across the street where many people have died or have been reported missing, and strange phenomena can be witnessed at night. She has always dreaded that place, and now what was supposed to be a nice celebration will turn out to be a night full of horrors beyond human comprehension...
The horrors of...The Toy Factory Across the Street...

The Toy Factory Across the Street is a horror game created by Axel Vejar Dossow and made with the Rpg Maker MV engine.

Rpg Maker MV belongs to Kadokawa

WARNING: This game contains blood, gore, disturbing imagery, bizarre situations and jumpscares.

FEATURES

INSPIRED BY THE HORROR FILMS OF THE 80'S 4 ENDINGS 12 COLLECTIBLES NIGHTMARISH SCENEARIOS BIZARRE SITUATIONS HORRID ABOMINATIONS CREEPY TOYS WEIRD PUZZLES
